key.name: gamemode
key.description: If set to true, the game mode will be set to TetriFast. If false, GTetrinet will use the original mode.

key.name: server
key.summary: Server where you want to play
key.description: This is the server where GTetrinet will try to connect.

key.name: sound-enable
key.description: Enables/Disables sound. Keep in mind that the theme that you're using must provide sounds.

key.name: player-nickname
key.description: This will be your nickname in the game.

key.name: player-team
key.description: This will be the name of your team.

key.name: partyline-enable-timestamps
key.description: Enables/disables timestamps in the partyline.

key.name: partyline-enable-channel-list
key.description: Enables/disables the channel list. Disable it if you experience problems when connecting or while playing in your favorite tetrinet server.

key.name: directory
key.summary: Theme directory, should end with a '/'
key.description: The current theme directory. It should contain a readable "blocks.png" and a "theme.cfg".

key.name: right
key.description: This key moves the block to the right. This is case insensitive.

key.name: left
key.description: This key moves the block to the left. This is case insensitive.

key.name: rotate-right
key.description: This key rotates the block clockwise. This is case insensitive.

key.name: rotate-left
key.description: This key rotates the block counterclockwise. This is case insensitive.

key.name: down
key.description: This key moves the block down. This is case insensitive.

key.name: drop
key.description: This key drops the block to the ground. This is case insensitive.

key.name: message
key.summary: Key to open the fields' message dialog
key.description: This key displays the fields' message dialog. This is case insensitive.

key.name: discard
key.description: This key discards the current special. This is case insensitive.

key.name: special1
key.summary: Key to use the current special on field 1
key.description: This key uses the current special on Player 1's game field.

key.name: special2
key.summary: Key to use the current special on field 2
key.description: This key uses the current special on Player 2's game field.

key.name: special3
key.summary: Key to use the current special on field 3
key.description: This key uses the current special on Player 3's game field.

key.name: special4
key.summary: Key to use the current special on field 4
key.description: This key uses the current special on Player 4's game field.

key.name: special5
key.summary: Key to use the current special on field 5
key.description: This key uses the current special on Player 5's game field.

key.name: special6
key.summary: Key to use the current special on field 6
key.description: This key uses the current special on Player 6's game field.
